mapper.select:
select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AdultNumber,a.BabyNumber,a.OldNumber,a.ChildNumber, a.statu,a.CompanyName,a.CompanyUser,a.IsPayment,a.IsCancel,d.ExamineType,a.ContactName,a.ContactTel,a.AllPrice,a.Type,d.ExamineResult, a.ApplyPic from Line b join Apply a on a.LineId = b.Id join (select ea2.* from (select Max(createdate) as createdate,ApplyId from Examine where ExamineType = '0' or ExamineType = '1' group by ApplyId) ea inner join Examine ea2 on ea.createdate = ea2.createdate) d on a.Id = d.ApplyId
1 = 1 and a.IsPayment = 1
and datediff(day,#{outDate},a.OutDate) >= 0
and datediff(day,a.OutDate,#{outDateEnd}) >= 0
and b.Id = #{lineName}
and d.ExamineType = '0' and a.IsCancel = 0
and d.ExamineType = '1'
and (a.CreateDate between #{start} and #{end})
and ((d.ExamineType = '0' or d.ExamineType = '1') and d.ExamineResult = 0 and a.IsCancel != 1)
and ((d.ExamineType = '0' or d.ExamineType = '1') and d.ExamineResult != 0)
and b.City in
#{item}
order by a.CreateDate desc

select count (*) from (select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AdultNumber,a.BabyNumber,a.OldNumber,a.ChildNumber, a.statu,a.CompanyName,a.CompanyUser,a.IsPayment,a.IsCancel,d.ExamineType,a.ContactName,a.ContactTel,a.AllPrice,a.Type,d.ExamineResult, a.ApplyPic from Line b join Apply a on a.LineId = b.Id join Examine d on a.Id = d.ApplyId where 1 = 1 and a.IsPayment = 1 and ((d.ExamineType = '0' or d.ExamineType = '1') and d.ExamineResult = 0 and a.IsCancel != 1)) kk

select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AllNumber, a.ContactName,a.ContactTel,a.Statu from Apply a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id where a.CompanyName = #{CompanyName} ORDER by a.OutDate desc

select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AllNumber, a.ContactName,a.ContactTel,a.Statu from Apply a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id where a.CompanyName = #{CompanyName} and a.OutDate = #{OutTime} ORDER by a.OutDate desc
select * from Company where Id = #{Id}

select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AllNumber,a.AllPrice,a.MarketAllPrice, a.ContactName,a.ContactTel,a.Statu,a.IsCancel,a.IsPayment,convert(varchar(100),a.CreateDate,20) as 'CreateDate' ,a.ChildNumber,a.OldNumber,a.BabyNumber,a.AdultNumber,a.Place,a.CName,a.PayType,a.Type as 'type',a.Icnumber from Apply a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id where a.CreateUserId =#{id} and (a.CreateDate between #{startDate} and #{endDate}) ORDER by a.CreateDate desc

select a.Id,a.ApplyNo,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as 'OutDate',b.LineName,a.AllNumber,a.AllPrice,a.MarketAllPrice, a.ContactName,a.ContactTel,a.Statu,a.IsCancel,a.IsPayment,convert(varchar(100),a.CreateDate,20) as 'CreateDate' ,a.ChildNumber,a.OldNumber,a.BabyNumber,a.AdultNumber,a.Place,a.CName,a.PayType,a.Type as 'type',a.Icnumber from Apply a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id where a.CreateUserId =#{id} and a.IsSelect = 1 and a.OutDate = #{outDate} ORDER by a.CreateDate desc
select OpenId as 'openId' from PayInfo where UserId = #{userId}

select a.Id,convert(varchar(20),a.OutDate,23) as 'OutDate',a.AllPrice,b.LineName,a.AllNumber,a.IsPayment, a.CompanyUser,a.ContactName from Apply a join Line b on a.LineId = b.Id
1 = 1 and a.PayType = 1 and a.IsCancel = 0
and a.OutDate = #{outDate}
and a.IsPayment = 0
and a.IsPayment = 1
ORDER by a.OutDate desc

update.foreach: update Apply set IsCancel = 1 where ApplyNo = #{item.applyNo}
update Apply set IsSelect = 1,GuideName = #{item.guide},GuideTel = #{item.tel} where Id = #{item.id}

mapper.select: select Sum(Allprice)allPrice,Sum(AllNumber)allNumber,sum(MsPrice)msPrice from Apply where CreateUserId = #{id} and SxType = 0 and (PayType = 1 or PayType = 2) and IsCancel = 0 group by CreateUserId
select * from Apply where (PayType = 1 or PayType = 2) and CompanyId = #{id} and IsCancel = 0 and SxType = 0

select a.Id as 'id',a.Place as 'place',a.PayType as 'payType',convert(varchar(100),a.CreateDate,20)createDate, isnull(a.MsPrice,0.0)msPrice,a.ApplyRemark as 'applyRemark',b.ThirdPartyNumber as 'thirdNumber', convert(varchar(100),b.PayDate,20)payDate,b.PayStatu as 'payStatus',b.PayType as 'type',a.AllPrice as 'payPrice', a.CompanyName as 'companyName',a.OutDate as 'outDate',d.LineName as 'lineName',a.ContactName as 'contactName', a.ContactTel as 'contactTel',a.AllNumber as 'allNumber',a.AdultNumber as 'adultNumber',a.BabyNumber as 'babyNumber', a.OldNumber as 'oldNumber',a.ChildNumber as 'childNumber',a.AllPrice as 'allPrice',a.Type as 'ctmType',a.ApplyPic as 'applyPic',a.Icnumber,a.City from Apply a left join Pay b on a.ApplyNo = b.ApplyNo join Line d on a.LineId = d.Id where a.ApplyNo = #{applyNo}
